price: Ṣùgbọ́n ó lo gbogbo agbára rẹ̀ láti kẹ̀yìn sí òdodo. Ó sì wí pé: “Òpìdán tàbí wèrè kan (nìyí).”
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
